subSections.title: Readings
Compounds
subSections.text:
{{der-top|Compounds}}
* {{ja-r|仁王|におう}}: the two guardian Deva kings
* {{ja-r|仁義|じんぎ}}: humanity and justice
* {{ja-r|仁愛|じんあい}}: benevolence, charity
* {{ja-r|仁術|じんじゅつ}}: benevolence act
* {{ja-r|仁義礼智信|じんぎれいちしん}}: the 5 Confucian virtues
* {{ja-r|仁徳|じんとく}}: benevolence, goodness
{{der-bottom}}
